text: Thanks for all the responses here. I’ll queue some dates in Sept.
Unrelated, BBBP is asking if we’d be willing to host Congressman Blumenauer on Aug 1. Do we know when the steps are going to be done?
<@U026NB2U2> still waiting for an updated schedule on stair completion from our GC. Will update you as soon as it’s received!

k. sounds like I shouldn’t wait on that to make a decision on hosting Blumenauer. Maybe it’s a 4th floor kitchen event or a rooftop event. I’ve responded to Ashley from BBBP to get a sense of how many people they’d invite.
i think that’s probably the best way to go!
I think it'd be really cool to host this! 4th floor kitchen or roof should work if stairs aren't open.
<@U026NB2U2> can you let me know when confirmed?
